text: I really like the promise of Macaw. So sad to see them get acquired <http://macaw.co/invision/>
eh, probably better IMO - too many prototyping tools out there- excited for the changes that it might bring to InVision
Agreed. My understanding was that Macaw was supposed to be for final implementation not prototyping which was very exciting for many folks.
But yes, the prototyping marked is saturated.
